# Icons

Icon component for Unlocked.

WARNING

We currently only support material design iconsopen in new window.

# Usage

# Import an SVG icon

import { mdiAccount } from '@mdi/js'
1

# Pass into default slot

<Icon>
 {{ mdiAccount }}
</Icon>
1
2
3
